name: Nuts in the World of Fantasy
overview: Published in Italy as Snocciolando in Special C64 n.6 (1991/1992). The focus of this game are nuts of different colors which are arranged in two square containers. Your task is to reproduce the same arrangement of the right square in the left. While you cannot move a single nut, you must move a whole vertical or horizontal row at the same time. To move you position the cursor with the nut of the chosen row, hit the button and move your joystick in the desired direction. You have a time limit for each section so most fast if you want to move to the next level.
